VEC.Q: How many slices are there in this pie chart?
VEC.A: There are {6} slices in this pie chart.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the clockwise direction from slice Collaborative Research?
SRP.A: The next slice clockwise from slice Collaborative Research is {Innovative Solution}.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the counterclockwise direction from slice Collaborative Research?
SRP.A: The next slice counterclockwise from slice Collaborative Research is {Publication}.

VPR.Q: Which discipline-wise has the largest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The discipline-wise with the largest proportion is {Collaborative Research}.

VPR.Q: Which discipline-wise has the smallest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The discipline-wise with the smallest proportion is {Patent}.

VE.Q: What is the value of the Publication slice in this pie chart?
VE.A: The value of the Publication slice is {20}%.

VE.A: The value of the PhD Thesis slice is {11}%.

VE.A: The value of the Collaborative Research slice is {22}%.

What is the minimum value in this pie chart?

SC.Q: What is the difference between the values of Patent and Collaborative Research in this pie chart?
SC.A: The difference between Patent and Collaborative Research is {12}%.

SC.Q: What is the sum of the values of Innovative Solution and Publication in this pie chart?
SC.A: The sum of Innovative Solution and Publication is {41}%.

NF.Q: Which categories in the pie chart exceed 20.75%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.
NF.A: {Collaborative Research} accounts for {22}% and {Innovative Solution} accounts for {21}%

NF.Q: Which categories in the pie chart are below 12.25%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.
NF.A: {PhD Thesis} accounts for {11}% and {Patent} accounts for {10}%

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Collaborative Research or Innovative Solution?
NC.A: The value of {Collaborative Research} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Collaborative Research, Innovative Solution, or Publication?

MSR.Q: Which three sectors have a sum of percentage less than 40%? List all possible combinations.
MSR.A: The possible combinations are: {(Research Grant, PhD Thesis, Patent)}.
